component.caption: AMQP-0-9 Acknowledge Message
component.description: Acknowledges the AMQP-0-9 message that is currently processed by Mule.

boolean.name: multiple
boolean.caption: Exchange Durable
boolean.description: Set to true to acknowledge all messages up to and including the delivery tag of the AMQP-0-9 message that is currently processed by Mule; false to acknowledge just the current message.

component.caption: AMQP-0-9 Reject Message
component.description: Rejects the AMQP-0-9 message that is currently processed by Mule.

boolean.name: requeue
boolean.caption: Requeue
boolean.description: Set to true if the rejected message should be requeued rather than discarded/dead-lettered.

component.caption: AMQP-0-9 Recover
component.description: Ask the broker to resend unacknowledged messages. In 0-8 basic.recover is asynchronous; in 0-9-1 it is synchronous.

boolean.name: requeue
boolean.caption: Requeue
boolean.description: If true, messages will be requeued and possibly delivered to a different consumer. If false, messages will be redelivered to the same consumer.
